name: MERN Stack
description: MERN stands for MongoDB, Express, React, Node, after the four key technologies that make up the stack.

name: Node.js
description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

name: MVC
description: Model–view–controller is a software design pattern commonly used for developing user interfaces that divide the related program logic into three interconnected elements
